mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Mr. Sandman" and "Swingin' on a Star" ROUND DANCES "Dancing Tambourine" and "Joy Ride" SPECIAL FEATURES "Oklahoma's Invitation", "How We Dance in Oklahoma City", "More About the Caller", "Heart Warmers", and "The Caller and Musicians, Chapter Two". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Square Dance Picture", "Women on the Square", "The Square of the Month", "On the Record", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
